about_the_game:
Character Introduction

Wifuko

A wife which loves her husband and is willing to sacrifice for the happiness of their family. Now she is facing a little problem which is related to sex...

Playstyle

Free and easy casual simulation game to enjoy. Choose the path that Wifuko will be, and enjoy.

Route/ Ending

There will be 3 routes for you to choose from, Netorare, Netori, or Netorase. (WIP, might change)

content_descriptors.notes:
This ADULT Game contains content not appropriate for all ages and is not appropriate for viewing at work: Nudity or Sexual Content, General Mature Content.
All characters involved in sexual content are over the age of 18.

detailed_description:
Character Introduction

Wifuko

A wife which loves her husband and is willing to sacrifice for the happiness of their family. Now she is facing a little problem which is related to sex...

Playstyle

Free and easy casual simulation game to enjoy. Choose the path that Wifuko will be, and enjoy.

Route/ Ending

There will be 3 routes for you to choose from, Netorare, Netori, or Netorase. (WIP, might change)

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: High Sierra 10.13+
  • Processor: Apple Silicon, x64 architecture with SSE2
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Metal capable Intel and AMD GPUs
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

name: NTRstory

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 7
  • Processor: x86, x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX10, DX11, DX12 capable
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: NTRStory is a casual simulation game where you, the player will plan your step to lead Wifuko to the journey of lust and happiness. Choose your path of either Netorare, Netori, or Netorase, this is your story...
